description: Describes the VPC resources, VPC endpoint services, Amazon Lattice services, or service networks associated with the VPC endpoint.

parameters.name: VpcEndpointIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the VPC endpoints. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. vpc-endpoint-id - The ID of the VPC endpoint. associated-resource-accessibility - The association state. When the state is accessible, it returns AVAILABLE. When the state is inaccessible, it returns PENDING or FAILED. association-id - The ID of the VPC endpoint association. associated-resource-id - The ID of the associated resource configuration. service-network-arn - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the associated service network. Only VPC endpoints of type service network will be returned. resource-configuration-group-arn - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource configuration of type GROUP. service-network-resource-association-id - The ID of the association. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint association.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC endpoint.

nested_items.name: ServiceNetworkArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service network.

nested_items.name: ServiceNetworkName
nested_items.description: The name of the service network.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResourceAccessibility
nested_items.description: The connectivity status of the resources associated to a VPC endpoint. The resource is accessible if the associated resource configuration is AVAILABLE, otherwise the resource is inaccessible.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: A message related to why an VPC endpoint association failed.

nested_items.name: FailureCode
nested_items.description: An error code related to why an VPC endpoint association failed.

nested_items.name: HostedZoneId
nested_items.description: The ID of the private hosted zone.

nested_items.name: PrivateDnsEntry
nested_items.description: The private DNS entry of the VPC endpoint association.

nested_items.name: HostedZoneId
nested_items.description: The ID of the private hosted zone.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the associated resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfigurationGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource configuration group.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags to apply to the VPC endpoint association.
